class.name: Theme
class.description: A theme for skinning controls. Controls can be skinned individually, but for complex applications, it's more practical to just create a global theme that defines everything. This theme can be applied to any [Control]; the Control and its children will automatically use it. Theme resources can alternatively be loaded by writing them in a [code].theme[/code] file, see the documentation for more information.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears all values on the theme.

method.name: clear_color
method.description: Clears the [Color] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: clear_constant
method.description: Clears the constant at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: clear_font
method.description: Clears the [Font] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: clear_icon
method.description: Clears the icon at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: clear_stylebox
method.description: Clears [StyleBox] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: copy_default_theme
method.description: Sets the theme's values to a copy of the default theme values.

method.name: copy_theme
method.description: Sets the theme's values to a copy of a given theme.

method.name: get_color
method.description: Returns the [Color] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_color_list
method.description: Returns all the [Color]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Color]'s name, for use in [method get_color], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_constant
method.description: Returns the constant at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_constant_list
method.description: Returns all the constants as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each constant's name, for use in [method get_constant], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_font
method.description: Returns the [Font] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_font_list
method.description: Returns all the [Font]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Font]'s name, for use in [method get_font], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_icon
method.description: Returns the icon [Texture] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_icon_list
method.description: Returns all the icons as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Texture]'s name, for use in [method get_icon], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_stylebox
method.description: Returns the [StyleBox] at [code]name[/code] if the theme has [code]node_type[/code]. Valid [code]name[/code]s may be found using [method get_stylebox_list]. Valid [code]node_type[/code]s may be found using [method get_stylebox_types].

method.name: get_stylebox_list
method.description: Returns all the [StyleBox]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [StyleBox]'s name, for use in [method get_stylebox], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code]. Valid [code]node_type[/code]s may be found using [method get_stylebox_types].

method.name: get_stylebox_types
method.description: Returns all the [StyleBox] types as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [StyleBox]'s type, for use in [method get_stylebox] and/or [method get_stylebox_list], if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: get_type_list
method.description: Returns all the types in [code]node_type[/code] as a [PoolStringArray] for use in any of the [code]get_*[/code] functions, if the theme has [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: has_color
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [Color] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]node_type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: has_constant
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if constant with [code]name[/code] is in [code]node_type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: has_font
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [Font] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]node_type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: has_icon
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if icon [Texture] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]node_type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: has_stylebox
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [StyleBox] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]node_type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: set_color
method.description: Sets the theme's [Color] to [code]color[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]node_type[/code]. Does nothing if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: set_constant
method.description: Sets the theme's constant to [code]constant[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]node_type[/code]. Does nothing if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: set_font
method.description: Sets the theme's [Font] to [code]font[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]node_type[/code]. Does nothing if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: set_icon
method.description: Sets the theme's icon [Texture] to [code]texture[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]node_type[/code]. Does nothing if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].

method.name: set_stylebox
method.description: Sets theme's [StyleBox] to [code]stylebox[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]node_type[/code]. Does nothing if the theme does not have [code]node_type[/code].
